title: Hagure Yuusha no Aesthetica (Aesthetica of a Rogue Hero)
synopsis: Since the discovery of "Samon Syndrome" 30 years ago, thousands of young people have traveled to fantasy worlds, the few returnees managing to keep the special abilities they acquired in those parallel universes.
